being-processed.applied-by-mail: If you applied by mail or at a Service Canada Centre offering 20-day passport services, it may take up to 20 business days for us to complete the review.
being-processed.applied-in-person: If you applied in person at a passport office or a Service Canada Centre offering 10-day passport service, it may take up to 10 business days for us to complete the review.
being-processed.dont-meet-standards: If we don't meet our service standards
being-processed.get-urgent: Find out how to get <Link>urgent or express service for existing applications</Link> if you need the passport within 10 business days. Extra fees may apply.
being-processed.incomplete: In some cases, we may not be able to process an incomplete application and will return it to you as soon as possible. You will receive a letter by mail explaining why we cannot process the application as well as your supporting documents.
being-processed.may-be-eligible: You may be eligible for a partial refund if we don't meet our <Link>service standards</Link>.
being-processed.need-faster: If you need the passport faster
being-processed.ready-within: If your application has been duly completed, your passport should be ready within our <Link>service standards</Link>. However, it may take a bit longer to process an application during peak periods.
being-processed.received: We have received your application and are now reviewing it
being-processed.received-will-not-change: We have received your application and are now reviewing it. Your status will not change as we are reviewing the application.
being-processed.we-will-contact: If we need more information, we'll contact you by telephone, mail, or email. If we contact you by telephone, the call may show up as a blocked number. We will never contact you by text message or instant message.

error.current: The date of birth must be in the past.
error.invalid: The date of birth must be valid in the following format: YYYY-MM-DD (Year-Month-Day).
error.required: The date of birth is required.

date-of-birth.help-message: Enter the date of birth of the person who the passport is for.
date-of-birth.label: Date of birth

esrf.help-message: If you can't find the reference number, you can <Link>request to receive it</Link>.
esrf.label: Reference number

given-name.title: If the applicant has a single legal name
given-name.help-message: Enter first name(s) and any middle name(s) of the person who the passport is for. Make sure the information you enter matches your passport application.
given-name.label: Given name(s)

header: Get the status of your passport application

header-messages.matches: Make sure the information you enter matches your passport application.

no-record.can-review: You can review the information you entered and try again.

cannot-give-status.because: We can't give you the application status right now. The status of your passport is not available because:
cannot-give-status.description: We can't give you the application status right now

list.item-1: the information you gave us doesn't match the information in our system or
list.item-2: we received the application, but haven't started processing it yet

no-record.contact-us: If you can't get the application status using this tool, or if the application is taking longer than the <Link>service standard</Link>, please <Link2>contact us</Link2>.
no-record.get-urgent: Find out how to get <Link>urgent or express service for existing applications</Link> if you need the passport within 10 business days. Extra fees may apply.
no-record.need-faster: If you need the passport faster

not-acceptable.cannot-process: We've reviewed your application and can't process it further
not-acceptable.explanation: We've reviewed your application and can't process it further. We're sending you a letter explaining why and will return your supporting documents at the same time.

one-name: Applicants with only one name (single or multiple names entered all in one field) must call us at 1‑800‑567‑6868 to get the status of their application.
previous: Check the status of another application

printing.reviewed-printing: Your application has been reviewed, and your passport is now ready for printing. Please note that the printing process may take a few business days.

service-standards.we-received: We received your application on {{receivedDate}}. Our <Link>service standard</Link> for mail-in applications is 20 business days.
service-standards.dont-meet: If we don’t meet our service standard, you may be eligible for a partial refund.

ready-for-pickup.check-receipt: Check your receipt for pick-up instructions
ready-for-pickup.date-passed: If your pick-up date has passed, you can go in anytime to pick up your passport.
ready-for-pickup.has-been-printed: Your application is approved. Your passport will be available for pick-up on the date indicated on your receipt.
ready-for-pickup.not-available: Your passport will not be available before the pick-up date printed on your receipt.
ready-for-pickup.receipt-details: Your receipt details the date and location that you should pick-up your passport.

reset: Check the status of another application

shipped-canada-post.header: Your passport has been printed and mailed
shipped-canada-post.mailing: We're mailing it to you by Canada Post
shipped-canada-post.remote-area: If you live in a northern or remote area, it may take up to 8 business days.
shipped-canada-post.supporting-documents: We may send your supporting documents back separately.
shipped-canada-post.take-up-to: It can take up to 2 to 3 business days to arrive.

shipped-fedex.header: Your passport has been printed and mailed to you

country-canada.header: Information for clients whose passport is being mailed within Canada
country-canada.mailing: We're sending it to you by Purolator

country-us.header: Information for clients whose passport is being mailed to the United States
country-us.mailing: We're sending it to you by FedEx

shipped-fedex.supporting-documents: We may send your supporting documents back separately.
shipped-fedex.take-up-to: It can take up to 5 to 7 business days to arrive.

status-check-call: <Link>Contact us</Link> if you don't receive your documents within 6 weeks of receiving your passport.

surname.help-message: Enter last name of the person who the passport is for. Make sure the information you enter matches your passport application.
surname.label: Surname
